Excel with Agent Mode sounds like the upgrade we‚Äôve all needed‚Äîfinally, a spreadsheet that feels less like a stubborn coworker and more like a sidekick who actually helps with the heavy lifting. Maybe now those mysterious VLOOKUP errors can get a bit of sympathy too. If you want to bring that kind of partnership to your business chatbots, [https://www.chat-data.com](https://www.chat-data.com?trk=public_post_comment-text)/ makes it a breeze. Their platform lets AI agents collaborate, automate, and even manage multi-modal inputs, so your workflow tools start acting like real teammates‚Äînot just lines of code you wrangle all day.
